documents.document: @JasonPHT After 51 games, same 52 points as last season. Only 3 up on 28th instead of 5, and have a worse GF/GA differential than last year
@_Proto I think "Superbad" would still fit in this game.
@JasonPHT Awful idea. Trading Shinkaruk + a pick in order to keep a waiver caliber replacement level player?
@pheenster01 Let me ask you this: if you trade Virtanen today for Josh Jooris, and Virtanen ends up a bust, is it still a good trade?
@dbekar81 @Van_city_Nucks @Stats87 @Tmart1040 @tweetalex997 @Arpannnnn 52 points in 50 games this year. Had 51 in 50 last year lol28th place
@Van_city_Nucks @VANcanucks92 @Tmart1040 Granlund is Brandon Pirri. Same player. Pirri was recently waived.
@Van_city_Nucks @VANcanucks92 @Tmart1040 With Granlund's icetime? I'm sure he could be as much of a liability. No doubt.
@Van_city_Nucks @Stats87 @Tmart1040 @tweetalex997 @Arpannnnn @dbekar81 Can't stand management that's destroyed this team
@Stats87 @Tmart1040 @tweetalex997 @Arpannnnn @dbekar81 @Van_city_Nucks Except he's hurting the team with all the goals scored against him
@Stats87 @Tmart1040 @tweetalex997 @Arpannnnn @dbekar81 @Van_city_Nucks A smart GM gets baertschi for cheaper. He was done in Calgary
@Stats87 @Tmart1040 @tweetalex997 @Arpannnnn @dbekar81 @Van_city_Nucks Granlund is a liability who's a replacement level player.Dime a dozen
@VANcanucks92 @Tmart1040 @Van_city_Nucks Granlund is an NHL veteran. Shinkaruk is still a prospect who is waiver exempt. Big difference
@Tmart1040 @Van_city_Nucks Doubtful. Granlund would likely have been waived by now. Canucks could have him and Shinkaruk
@Tmart1040 @Van_city_Nucks Giving up a prospect who's producing at the ahl level for an NHL replacement level player is not a good deal.
@Van_city_Nucks @fr_aquilini Brandon Pirri could have been had for free and been equally as bad defensively and inefficient offensively
@Van_city_Nucks @fr_aquilini Good for them. You're wrong though. Baertschi sure, but Granlund is a replacement level player statistically
@JohnnyNuck @Van_city_Nucks Based on the stats.His GF%, GA60, and his scoring chances against.On ice for almost double the goals he produces
@Van_city_Nucks @fr_aquilini Wrong. Granlund is a big defensive liability and poor offensively given his minutes. Ditto with Sutter
@fr_aquilini Not on the right track at all. Team lacks elite prospects. Almost every trade Benning has made has hurt this team
@arsmaster69 She would be the Jim Benning of the US education system.
@MarciaOnTheGo Bernie Sanders represented change, DNC stacked the deck against him. People didn't vote or went for trump. Now we all screwed
@MarciaOnTheGo Clinton's antagonization of Russia was concerning, and was a pure establishment candidate. People wanted change
@willesonsports If Benning and Weisbrod are back I'll boycot the team completely. I can't support the mess they've created.
@botchford @taj1944 @SatiarShah @SHAP4LIFE @DavePratt1040 Team has same pts total as after 50 last year. Other teams around them got worse
@sportsnetmurph Jim Benning has said he believes this is a playoff team.
@JoshRowlands9 @BeggsTHW Pirri scored 22 and could have been had for free. Also Granlund hasn't scored 20 yet, so....
@DustinDame @arsmaster69 The team's point total is roughly the same as this time last year. Others around us have just got worse.
@Canucks Why is our leading scorer on the 3rd line?
@BeggsTHW His goals against/60 is awful. Yes his PDO is low, but it's worth noting his linemates play better without him than with him.
@JoshRowlands9 @BeggsTHW Brandon Pirri scored 22 but he was traded for a 6th round pick and was on waivers this year.
@BeggsTHW Just because you say he has a good 200 foot game doesn't make it true. Defensively he's been awful.
@mattsekeres @BeggsTHW Granlund has been awful defensively and has been scored on at an almost 2:1 ratio as the offense he's produced.
@BeggsTHW @mattsekeres Granlund is a replacement level player. Good comparable is Pirri who was just on waivers. That's still an awful trade
@NicholsOnHockey @FanRagSports Benning knew every other team would struggle? Canucks with same point total as this time last year....
@mattsekeres Been doing it all year. We're only 3 points out of 28th. 🤞
@JakeCanuck @GovindMinhas Not true re:draft. There's a drop off after the 7th or 8th pick. Plus anything that gets Benning/Linden fired = 👍
@GovindMinhas I see it as the opposite. This hurts the Canucks long term. Finishing 9th or even 8th and being smashed won't help anything
@bunktuzzi44 Of course not. Dallas is playing. They won last week. Those reports Green Bay beat Dallas were just fake news #alternatefacts
@JDylanBurke I posted this on a message board. Recovered at the 1 and he rolled into the end zone. Shocked no review.
@BoLeviMitchell I got the same prediction. Green Bay and New England. Should be an exciting Super Bowl.
@SatiarShah @SFOJay Lol there's no way 19 should be up. Captain invisible during the playoffs. At least Linden meant a lot to the community
@_Proto @DustinDame These are the same people who think Benning will make the Canucks great again. Seriously. SMH
@canuktraveller @TheGreatHockey uh this team improved defensively when Gudbranson went down. He's going to be grossly overpaid
@canuktraveller @TheGreatHockey LOL against a bad Nashville team. Just wait until February/March. Tougher schedule.
@botchford Maybe there was a spider on his finger and he wanted to shake it off before putting it near his mouth?
@imacVanSun Uh wrong result. That should have been a good goal.
@ochocinco Absolutely. Great young QB, franchise RB. That team will be a force for years.
@TheStanchion He was sour about the Cowboys losing and wanted to take it out on the Canucks.
@GovindMinhas Only good game so far these playoffs, but was a classic. Wanted Dallas to win, but supporting Green Bay going forward
@Nuckles37 @Verviticus @HockeyDipshit @DubiousRhino It's a shame @arsmaster69 got banned yet trolls like Krutov, Grangod, and others remain
@Verviticus @HockeyDipshit @DubiousRhino It's insufferable. Stat deniers who think their opinion is correct "just because" w/o any evidence
Didn't realize how bad #NFL officiating is. So many missed pass interference calls. It's insane.
@EdlundEric I got Dallas and Pittsburgh today.
@ochocinco I'd probably beat you but I don't have the game. Let's settle this in Madden 2k15? 👀
@JoeSantagato Enjoying my chicken permission and Julius Caesar salad on a Saturday night. 😂😂😂
@JDylanBurke Do you prefer using corsi metrics over scoring chances/high danger scoring chance metrics?
@botchford Might protect Megna instead of Horvat who's just a checker.
@EdlundEric @BCLions @Bighill44 @Saints Would be nice to see Biggie get a Super Bowl ring to go with his Grey Cup ring. Elite club
@Nuckles37 @BlakePriceTSN This
@T_cat53 Congrats on signing with the Colts! Good luck, and represent!
@BlakePriceTSN Or, like you said and like other teams have done, go a man down if you can't get an emergency call up in time.
@BlakePriceTSN If Rodin is too hurt to play, why not dress Hutton if you're going to bench him anyway? At least have the D on the bench
@BlakePriceTSN Huge respect for you for telling it like it is tonight and calling out the team (and Shorty) about Rodin's treatment
@EdlundEric Tough to go with San Antonio when they had a 1st overall pick in that span, while others like Detroit have never missed playoffs
Picks for this week: Raiders, Seahawks, Steelers, Packers.
@paulosenra @sportingintel I see no reason why the #CFL can't enter the top 5 on that list. Outside of stadium capacity in some cities.
@SDesai71 @AndyCole84 @botchford Lol Benning doesn't have a clue how to manage a sandwich, let alone a hockey team.
Front row at #YukYuks to see @DinoArchie tonight!
@zoeydeutch Canada has universal health care. I don't understand why the US is so resistant to a similar system.
@TSN1040 Tkachuk. No question. Not hindsight either as I was screaming this on draft day.
Such a BS way to ruin what was an amazing #WorldJuniors game. Shootouts should never determine a gold medal game.
Ain't she a beauty? Good weight on it. Happy to win some bling playing #fantasyfootball https://t.co/Hbtx9hDn8p
@DudeAb1ded Why does he deserve credit for Granlund? He's been awful.
@taj1944 Must be due to that winning culture they established by finishing 28th last season
@DinoArchie Happy birthday! Hope you had a great one. Planning to see your show on Friday at Yuk Yuks.
@BlakePriceTSN probably when the Canucks get new management/coach who understands Sutter is overrated and shouldn't be getting those mins
@BowelAuger @GovindMinhas @botchford Raymond, Ballard, and a second*
Congrats @Bighill44 on signing with the Saints. Will miss you in BC, but I'll be cheering you on to get that Super Bowl ring now! Good luck
@Joservice @markhmasters Motivation? This is the semi finals of an international tournament. What more motivation would they need?
@DavePratt1040 You guaranteed they would make the playoffs and win a round last year. Please stop guaranteeing things.
@arsmaster69 I thought Granlund was supposed to be Bergeron? Sutter was compared to Toews. Smh
@botchford Keep Tanev, trade Gudbranson who's an overpaid bottom pairing defenseman.
@BlakePriceTSN Ergo, Canada is better than Sweden 😉
@_Proto Eh...he did some good for Germany economically, but the idea Hull was talking about was a terrifying horrific idea. SMH
@patersonjeff You mean you don't frequent the Roxy too often? lol. Happy new year!
Happy New Year!!!!
@BakesTakes84 Yup same game. One of the best hockey games I've ever seen. The Russia game in that year's SF was amazing too.
@omgitsdomi @mirtle Amazing what a proper rebuild can do. #Canucks take notice?
@JDylanBurke Jason Megna was on the Canucks top line....
